meanings.definition: The act or process of discoloring.
meanings.sent1: The discoloration of the fabric was caused by the spilled juice.
meanings.sent2: I noticed some discoloration on the wall where the paint had faded.
meanings.sent3: The discoloration on the banana made it look like a zebra.
meanings.sent4: The discoloration of the sky during the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The discoloration of the leaves in autumn creates a beautiful mosaic of colors.

meanings.definition: A spot or stain that has been discolored.
meanings.sent1: She tried to remove the discoloration on the carpet with a cleaning solution.
meanings.sent2: The discoloration on the mirror made it difficult to see clearly.
meanings.sent3: The discoloration on the apple made it look like a tiny painting.
meanings.sent4: The discoloration on the map marked the location of the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The discoloration on the flower petals added a unique touch to the bouquet.
